description.en:
Add-on to Universal Autoload to include support for a large selection of ModHub vehicles.
This mod adds configurations for many popular ModHub vehicles and trailers. For bug reports, help and mod suggestions please visit: https://github.com/ddewar/FS22_UniversalAutoloadModhubAddon
Currently Supported: - FS22_20ftGooseneck - FS22_2PTS_6 - FS22_2PTS_6_console - FS22_Fliegl_SDS350J - FS22_Krone_Profi_Liner_HD - FS22_Profi_Liner_Flatbed - FS22_JohnDeere_Gator_Pack - FS22_selfMadeTrailer - FS22_reischPack - FS22_JoskinWagoLoader - FS22_TLX2020_Series - FS22_lizardCarTrailer - FS22_strautmannSEK802 - FS22_strautmannSZK802 - FS22_lindnerUnitrac122LDrive - FS22_allPurposeTool - FS22_Bailey_Bale_Pallet_Trailer - FS22_Brantner_DD_24073 - FS22_DPW_1800 - FS22_flieglDPW180 - FS22_flieglDPWpack - FS22_flieglFlatbed - FS22_Hw80_pack - FS22_LizardSantana88 - FS22_Lizard_Selfmade_Tow_Truck - FS22_PerardPack (only flatbed trailers) - FS22_PongePack (only flatbed trailers) - FS22_RollandPack (only flatbed trailers) - FS22_TLX3500_Series - FS22_TLX_Phoenix - FS22_orkelTX130 - FS22_adurante_R200A_crossplay - FS22_Pack_Aguas_Tenias_Platforms - FS22_lizardFlatbedTrailer - FS22_JohnDeere_1075HayWagon - FS22_lizardTrailerPack - FS22_Randon_BulkCarrier_RLine - FS22_MAN_TGX_26640_Platform - FS22_PTS_4_5_BURLAK_Pack - FS22_OldLowTrailer - FS22_Tps_001 - FS22_lizard_sp03_crossplay - FS22_camara_sp03 - FS22_LizardTrailer - FS22_53ftDryVan - FS22_flatBedTrailerCombo_AutoPack - FS22_dropdeckTrailer53Ft_AutoPack_crossplay - FS22_dropdeckTrailer53Ft_AutoPack - FS22_PackingFacility - FS22_seeds_addon_crossplay - FS22_SeedPotatoFarmBuildings - FS22_MapleSyrupProduction - FS22_DieselCanister - FS22_Farm_Supply_Pack - FS22_IndustrialSugar - FS22_Pallets_And_Bags_Pack - FS22_Pioneer_Seeds - FS22_PolishFertilizersPallets - FS22_Schaumann_Animal_Food_Pallet - FS22_ForagePack - FS22_Water_And_Diesel_Tank - FS22_Yara_Fertilizer_Pallets - FS22_YaraBigBagFertilizer - FS22_Bags_and_Support_Package - FS22_CzeBigBag - FS22_BigBagCattlePack - FS22_FertilizerBigBagsPack - FS22_FinnishBagsNPallets - FS22_PolandBigBags - FS22_PolishBigBag - FS22_Holmakra - FS22_GlobalTransportPallet - FS22_ITRunnerPack2433HD_2633HD - FS22_4000_H - FS22_lommaZDK1802Pack - FS22_Fiat682_N4 - FS22_Fiat190_48_TurboStar - FS22_Iveco190_48_TurboStar - FS22_SemiTrailer - FS22_tatraPhoenixKipper - FS22_marston22ftBaleTrailer_1993 - FS22_McCauleyLowloader - FS22_RandonBitrem - FS22_MaizePlus - FS22_Goldhofer_StzVp3 - FS22_Goldhofer_STZSpezial - FS22_HW80WoodTrailer - FS22_Kesla_144ND - FS22_LizardLT679SmallLogTrailer - FS22_LizardLT689LogTrailer - FS22_LizardLT699LogTrailer - FS22_ShortTimberTrailer - FS22_Longbunktimber - FS22_TimberPack - FS22_TLX_X52_Logger - FS22_Lizard_wood_trailer - More to come!
description.de:
Erweiterung für Universal Autoload.
Dieser Mod fügt Autoload Konfigurationen für viele beliebte ModHub Fahrzeuge und Anhänger hinzu. Für Fehlerberichte, Hilfe und Mod-Vorschläge besuchen Sie bitte: https://github.com/ddewar/FS22_UniversalAutoloadModhubAddon
Momentan unterstützt: - FS22_20ftGooseneck - FS22_2PTS_6 - FS22_2PTS_6_console - FS22_Fliegl_SDS350J - FS22_Krone_Profi_Liner_HD - FS22_Profi_Liner_Flatbed - FS22_JohnDeere_Gator_Pack - FS22_selfMadeTrailer - FS22_reischPack - FS22_JoskinWagoLoader - FS22_TLX2020_Series - FS22_lizardCarTrailer - FS22_strautmannSEK802 - FS22_strautmannSZK802 - FS22_lindnerUnitrac122LDrive - FS22_allPurposeTool - FS22_Bailey_Bale_Pallet_Trailer - FS22_Brantner_DD_24073 - FS22_DPW_1800 - FS22_flieglDPW180 - FS22_flieglDPWpack - FS22_flieglFlatbed - FS22_Hw80_pack - FS22_LizardSantana88 - FS22_Lizard_Selfmade_Tow_Truck - FS22_PerardPack (only flatbed trailers) - FS22_PongePack (only flatbed trailers) - FS22_RollandPack (only flatbed trailers) - FS22_TLX3500_Series - FS22_TLX_Phoenix - FS22_orkelTX130 - FS22_adurante_R200A_crossplay - FS22_Pack_Aguas_Tenias_Platforms - FS22_lizardFlatbedTrailer - FS22_JohnDeere_1075HayWagon - FS22_lizardTrailerPack - FS22_Randon_BulkCarrier_RLine - FS22_MAN_TGX_26640_Platform - FS22_PTS_4_5_BURLAK_Pack - FS22_OldLowTrailer - FS22_Tps_001 - FS22_lizard_sp03_crossplay - FS22_camara_sp03 - FS22_LizardTrailer - FS22_53ftDryVan - FS22_flatBedTrailerCombo_AutoPack - FS22_dropdeckTrailer53Ft_AutoPack_crossplay - FS22_dropdeckTrailer53Ft_AutoPack - FS22_PackingFacility - FS22_seeds_addon_crossplay - FS22_SeedPotatoFarmBuildings - FS22_MapleSyrupProduction - FS22_DieselCanister - FS22_Farm_Supply_Pack - FS22_IndustrialSugar - FS22_Pallets_And_Bags_Pack - FS22_Pioneer_Seeds - FS22_PolishFertilizersPallets - FS22_Schaumann_Animal_Food_Pallet - FS22_ForagePack - FS22_Water_And_Diesel_Tank - FS22_Yara_Fertilizer_Pallets - FS22_YaraBigBagFertilizer - FS22_Bags_and_Support_Package - FS22_CzeBigBag - FS22_BigBagCattlePack - FS22_FertilizerBigBagsPack - FS22_FinnishBagsNPallets - FS22_PolandBigBags - FS22_PolishBigBag - FS22_Holmakra - FS22_GlobalTransportPallet - FS22_ITRunnerPack2433HD_2633HD - FS22_4000_H - FS22_lommaZDK1802Pack - FS22_Fiat682_N4 - FS22_Fiat190_48_TurboStar - FS22_Iveco190_48_TurboStar - FS22_SemiTrailer - FS22_tatraPhoenixKipper - FS22_marston22ftBaleTrailer_1993 - FS22_McCauleyLowloader - FS22_RandonBitrem - FS22_MaizePlus - FS22_Goldhofer_StzVp3 - FS22_Goldhofer_STZSpezial - Bald noch mehr! - FS22_HW80WoodTrailer - FS22_Kesla_144ND - FS22_LizardLT679SmallLogTrailer - FS22_LizardLT689LogTrailer - FS22_LizardLT699LogTrailer - FS22_ShortTimberTrailer - FS22_Longbunktimber - FS22_TimberPack - FS22_TLX_X52_Logger - FS22_Lizard_wood_trailer
description.fr:
Complément à Autoload Universel permettant le support d'une large sélection de véhicules du ModHub.
Ce mod permet d'ajouter les fonctionnalités de l'Autoload Universel pour de nombreux véhicules et remorques du ModHub. Pour la déclaration d'erreurs, le support ou encore des suggestions d'améliorations, rendez-vous sur : https://github.com/ddewar/FS22_UniversalAutoloadModhubAddon
Liste des mods actuellement pris en charge : - FS22_20ftGooseneck - FS22_2PTS_6 - FS22_2PTS_6_console - FS22_Fliegl_SDS350J - FS22_Krone_Profi_Liner_HD - FS22_Profi_Liner_Flatbed - FS22_JohnDeere_Gator_Pack - FS22_selfMadeTrailer - FS22_reischPack - FS22_JoskinWagoLoader - FS22_TLX2020_Series - FS22_lizardCarTrailer - FS22_strautmannSEK802 - FS22_strautmannSZK802 - FS22_lindnerUnitrac122LDrive - FS22_allPurposeTool - FS22_Bailey_Bale_Pallet_Trailer - FS22_Brantner_DD_24073 - FS22_DPW_1800 - FS22_flieglDPW180 - FS22_flieglDPWpack - FS22_flieglFlatbed - FS22_Hw80_pack - FS22_LizardSantana88 - FS22_Lizard_Selfmade_Tow_Truck - FS22_PerardPack (uniquement les remorques à plateau) - FS22_PongePack (uniquement les remorques à plateau) - FS22_RollandPack (uniquement les remorques à plateau) - FS22_TLX3500_Series - FS22_TLX_Phoenix - FS22_orkelTX130 - FS22_adurante_R200A_crossplay - FS22_Pack_Aguas_Tenias_Platforms - FS22_lizardFlatbedTrailer - FS22_JohnDeere_1075HayWagon - FS22_lizardTrailerPack - FS22_Randon_BulkCarrier_RLine - FS22_MAN_TGX_26640_Platform - FS22_PTS_4_5_BURLAK_Pack - FS22_OldLowTrailer - FS22_Tps_001 - FS22_lizard_sp03_crossplay - FS22_camara_sp03 - FS22_LizardTrailer - FS22_53ftDryVan - FS22_flatBedTrailerCombo_AutoPack - FS22_dropdeckTrailer53Ft_AutoPack_crossplay - FS22_dropdeckTrailer53Ft_AutoPack - FS22_PackingFacility - FS22_seeds_addon_crossplay - FS22_SeedPotatoFarmBuildings - FS22_MapleSyrupProduction - FS22_DieselCanister - FS22_Farm_Supply_Pack - FS22_IndustrialSugar - FS22_Pallets_And_Bags_Pack - FS22_Pioneer_Seeds - FS22_PolishFertilizersPallets - FS22_Schaumann_Animal_Food_Pallet - FS22_ForagePack - FS22_Water_And_Diesel_Tank - FS22_Yara_Fertilizer_Pallets - FS22_YaraBigBagFertilizer - FS22_Bags_and_Support_Package - FS22_CzeBigBag - FS22_BigBagCattlePack - FS22_FertilizerBigBagsPack - FS22_FinnishBagsNPallets - FS22_PolandBigBags - FS22_PolishBigBag - FS22_Holmakra - FS22_GlobalTransportPallet - FS22_ITRunnerPack2433HD_2633HD - FS22_4000_H - FS22_lommaZDK1802Pack - FS22_Fiat682_N4 - FS22_Fiat190_48_TurboStar - FS22_Iveco190_48_TurboStar - FS22_SemiTrailer - FS22_tatraPhoenixKipper - FS22_marston22ftBaleTrailer_1993 - FS22_McCauleyLowloader - FS22_RandonBitrem - FS22_MaizePlus - FS22_Goldhofer_StzVp3 - FS22_Goldhofer_STZSpezial - FS22_HW80WoodTrailer - FS22_Kesla_144ND - FS22_LizardLT679SmallLogTrailer - FS22_LizardLT689LogTrailer - FS22_LizardLT699LogTrailer - FS22_ShortTimberTrailer - FS22_Longbunktimber - FS22_TimberPack - FS22_TLX_X52_Logger - FS22_Lizard_wood_trailer - Plus à venir!
description.cz:
Rozšíření k modu Univerzální Autoload, které umožňuje přidat další konfigurace pro velké množství různých vozidel z Modhubu.
Aktuálně přidává konfigurační parametry pro mnohé oblíbené vleky a další vozidla na Modhubu, uvedená v následujícím seznamu. Hlášení chyb, nápovědu a návrhy úprav naleznete na adrese: https://github.com/ddewar/FS22_UniversalAutoloadModhubAddon
Aktuálně podporovaná vozidla: - FS22_20ftGooseneck - FS22_2PTS_6 - FS22_2PTS_6_console - FS22_Fliegl_SDS350J - FS22_Krone_Profi_Liner_HD - FS22_Profi_Liner_Flatbed - FS22_JohnDeere_Gator_Pack - FS22_selfMadeTrailer - FS22_reischPack - FS22_JoskinWagoLoader - FS22_TLX2020_Series - FS22_lizardCarTrailer - FS22_strautmannSEK802 - FS22_strautmannSZK802 - FS22_lindnerUnitrac122LDrive - FS22_allPurposeTool - FS22_Bailey_Bale_Pallet_Trailer - FS22_Brantner_DD_24073 - FS22_DPW_1800 - FS22_flieglDPW180 - FS22_flieglDPWpack - FS22_flieglFlatbed - FS22_Hw80_pack - FS22_LizardSantana88 - FS22_Lizard_Selfmade_Tow_Truck - FS22_PerardPack (only flatbed trailers) - FS22_PongePack (only flatbed trailers) - FS22_RollandPack (only flatbed trailers) - FS22_TLX3500_Series - FS22_TLX_Phoenix - FS22_orkelTX130 - FS22_adurante_R200A_crossplay - FS22_Pack_Aguas_Tenias_Platforms - FS22_lizardFlatbedTrailer - FS22_JohnDeere_1075HayWagon - FS22_lizardTrailerPack - FS22_Randon_BulkCarrier_RLine - FS22_MAN_TGX_26640_Platform - FS22_PTS_4_5_BURLAK_Pack - FS22_OldLowTrailer - FS22_Tps_001 - FS22_lizard_sp03_crossplay - FS22_camara_sp03 - FS22_LizardTrailer - FS22_53ftDryVan - FS22_flatBedTrailerCombo_AutoPack - FS22_dropdeckTrailer53Ft_AutoPack_crossplay - FS22_dropdeckTrailer53Ft_AutoPack - FS22_PackingFacility - FS22_seeds_addon_crossplay - FS22_SeedPotatoFarmBuildings - FS22_MapleSyrupProduction - FS22_DieselCanister - FS22_Farm_Supply_Pack - FS22_IndustrialSugar - FS22_Pallets_And_Bags_Pack - FS22_Pioneer_Seeds - FS22_PolishFertilizersPallets - FS22_Schaumann_Animal_Food_Pallet - FS22_ForagePack - FS22_Water_And_Diesel_Tank - FS22_Yara_Fertilizer_Pallets - FS22_YaraBigBagFertilizer - FS22_Bags_and_Support_Package - FS22_CzeBigBag - FS22_BigBagCattlePack - FS22_FertilizerBigBagsPack - FS22_FinnishBagsNPallets - FS22_PolandBigBags - FS22_PolishBigBag - FS22_Holmakra - FS22_GlobalTransportPallet - FS22_ITRunnerPack2433HD_2633HD - FS22_4000_H - FS22_lommaZDK1802Pack - FS22_Fiat682_N4 - FS22_Fiat190_48_TurboStar - FS22_Iveco190_48_TurboStar - FS22_SemiTrailer - FS22_tatraPhoenixKipper - FS22_marston22ftBaleTrailer_1993 - FS22_McCauleyLowloader - FS22_RandonBitrem - FS22_MaizePlus - FS22_Goldhofer_StzVp3 - FS22_Goldhofer_STZSpezial - FS22_HW80WoodTrailer - FS22_Kesla_144ND - FS22_LizardLT679SmallLogTrailer - FS22_LizardLT689LogTrailer - FS22_LizardLT699LogTrailer - FS22_ShortTimberTrailer - FS22_Longbunktimber - FS22_TimberPack - FS22_TLX_X52_Logger - FS22_Lizard_wood_trailer - A další budou přidávána!
